mapper.select: select distinct a.code,a.shortname from JiaoCaiCompute a where a.status in ('7', '3') and a.picktype = 1
mapper.update: update JiaoCaiCompute set shipno=#{shipno},status = '6' where batchno = #{batchno} and code = #{code} and shipno is null
